title: Samsung launches the Galaxy Tab S8 series with a new, top-of-the-line Ultra variant with a notch
content:
Alongside the highly-anticipated Galaxy S22 series, Samsung today unveiled its latest lineup of flagship tablets. The new Galaxy Tab S8 series succeeds the Galaxy Tab S7 series from last year and features several significant upgrades, along with an entirely new top-of-the-line model. As you might have seen in various leaks over the last few months,

The post Samsung launches the Galaxy Tab S8 series with a new, top-of-the-line Ultra variant with a notch appeared first on xda-developers.
description: At its first Galaxy Unpacked event of 2022, Samsung unveiled its latest flagship tablets -- the Samsung Galaxy Tab S8, Galaxy Tab S8 Plus, and Galaxy Tab S8 Ultra.
